documents.document: @autumnbreezed I even took the test to see which party I should (and can’t) vote for!

Toby’s bedtime routine: “I want to pretend to sleep with Nathan. I then want to pretend to sleep with you on the beanbag. Next, my bed, with you, pretending.” Finally, he gets up & wanders back to the beanbag and falls asleep by himself. I wait, and then carry him to back to bed.
@GavinDYoung After birth comes afterbirth. Rats learn to drive in this novel.
@elliejoypanic Plus fort! :)
I should get it because he’s Nate’s favourite superhero and we could play it together; everyone says it’s fantastic; I’m still a gamer, honest; one extra game won’t … https://t.co/tEN1kyRikp
@SimonJ_McD I have to make them strong for the inevitable Cheese War of 2026. No son of mine will eat cheddar.
@jemalexander Farts are always funny. Also … https://t.co/m8wjxfMoNT
@GavinDYoung And I was in my 40s. #shit
@SimonJ_McD You’re one of us now. You’re not doing it right unless you walk out of that gym busted up.
@seanodonnell I’m pretty sure she wasn’t thinking of piranhas. At least, I hope she wasn’t.
@autumnbreezed You probably wanted to put dogs in them. Or butts.
@maplebetrayer Yes, very bad. Teste bad. ;)
@autumnbreezed All I know now is that I probably won’t be killed/eaten by fish. That’s not how I likely go. Probably.
@maplebetrayer I have no idea what celebteste is. This is like anti-autocorrect.
@autumnbreezed I assume you meant planet. My mind went to a dark place where Steph murders house plants with aplomb. :)
Arguing with Sheila about what’s the easiest way to cover up a murder. She thinks fish can eat an entire body. I am so safe, guys.
I’ve criticised Harrison Ford for phoning in performances in the latter part of his career. Good to see he still has the fire of a thousand suns inside him. https://t.co/qWQjUH0aeO

A writer.
A game dev director.
I think he would want me to travel back in time and beat up the asswipes who bullied me, screaming “He gets paid to make games in the future, fucko! You literally end up in prison!” https://t.co/AInFzUJEx5

@Combat_Cow Twitter is just wall to wall filth these days. Je suis dégusté. ;)
🧀 👄
“And here’s Roland Emmerich with the weather …” https://t.co/nle4qVlaCH
@maplebetrayer We always celebteste other teams’ releases at the studio. And one cake would not last very long with Motive’s savages. ;)
@maplebetrayer There were actually three of them. :)

@BenParfitt The trick is getting people to disbelieve you when you reveal you’re in your 40s. “There’s no way you’re 40.” “Almost 41 actually.” “But how?” “Put down the doughnut and I’ll reveal my arcane and unholy ways.”

@lucyjamesgames @GavinDYoung It’s the right thing to do. If anything because it’s new and different, and that pretty much is the meaning of life: do something different. But that doesn’t mean it’s easy. The right thing rarely is. Accepting this allows you to have the understandable wobble. :)
@Harkaway This was a real fucking rollercoaster. I did *not* expect this Shyamalanian twist finish at all. #iseemissingmemorycards
@real_picklebird Nothing is dumb that makes you happy.
Yes, yes, this is all fantastic but where is my PixelJunk Shooter 3 announcement? https://t.co/1r5VkJmftx
In my defence, Duncan Grimshaw is an extremely handsome dwarf. #howwasthefish https://t.co/7y7nZT3sgL
Happy NHL 19 Day! (Yes, it’s an ice-cream cake). https://t.co/y12bpzypz8
Trading horror stories of DMing at lunch. My favourite so far is “My players once spent two hours relaxing at a spa.”

Beer cans in Québec are very different than in Ireland.
Ireland: bold, brash primary colours. Allusions to royalty and/or insurrection.
Québec: is this vitamin water or some shit? https://t.co/itTjkdyev1
@brianlelas Have you considered it might by Henry? ;)
@elliejoypanic @GameDesignDan One black leg. One blue leg. One pair of pants. Sorted.
I’m not trying to suggest I’m like Elon Musk by the way. I just noticed the vocal quirk as oddly familiar.

I’ve started to watch the Elon Musk Joe Rogan podcast. Musk has this peculiar speech pattern that often sounds like he’s out of breath. Then I realised I kinda do that, too, when trying to talk and think about complex things at the same time.
@GameDesignDan @elliejoypanic Two? Fancy.
@GardaTraffic @seanodonnell Got a good chuckle out of this. Cheers, lads. Also, not sure what that rogue apostrophe is doing before re. Not blocking a bike lane at least.
@frlinux Yep! Serves me right for going on leave and letting the codes rot in my inbox and become redundant.
@tombramwell Apparently it's open now! I have been out of the office for over a week and there were some new codes in my inbox when I got in ;)
@KillaScorp Apparently it's open now :)
Any of my followers need a Battlefield V beta code? I may have a few ;)
@GreatDismal Fascinating. Though the first page, as I’m sure you know, is a letter. This look to be from later in the novel. https://t.co/tL3SPZLrfm
@DonH1981 Sleep tight.
@davegillen We should move in together. Start our own sitcom.
@JanDavidHassel A man can live on plastic hotdogs. I saw a documentary about it once. ;)
@davegillen Cocaine is a helluva drug.

Have you ever walked around those tiny fake IKEA show apartments and thought “Just brick up the walls, close down the store, and let me live in here forever, alone in this Swedish fantasy”? No? Just me? Alrighty then.
@BenParfitt @IndoorHeroes Yep. I muted for a week. I suspect the Spider-deluge will have eased off by then. :)
@autumnbreezed This guy literally said you pass the test or you get deported. They made a big deal about this part. I don’t know. I can’t vote for anyone anyway ;)
@IndoorHeroes @BenParfitt I for one muted the PS4Share hashtag because my feed had gotten very silly.

In other Montréal news, some shitehawk politician wants to kick out all the immigrants who can’t speak French.
*Frenches harder*

Missed the car rental drop off by 10 minutes yesterday. No dropbox. Walked in this morning ready to get the ole “Well, you had it an extra day” shite. Dude says “Ouch! 10 minutes? Don’t worry about it. Bon journée!”
Aha! Mystery solved! Cot Cot Codet does actually sound like a rooster. Merci, Guillaume! (Tu me manques, comme toujours). :) https://t.co/xg0tznmZer
@tiniel_cerulis @SteveShd Merci beaucoup! I think it looks strange to a native English speaker because to us chickens say “cuck” and cockerels “cock-a-doodle-doo!” Coat just looks amazingly funny. :)

@DaveNotJon @Omac_brother Something similar happened to me in an interview once. Candidate told me how bad a certain game was. They asked if I agreed. “Well, no, but I’m biased because my name’s in the credits.” Their eyes went the widest I’ve ever seen :)
@SteveShd @tiniel_cerulis In English cockerels do not shout Coat! :)
@gerrowadat What about FOUR Mars bars?
@elliejoypanic It’s a mere 250km for you! A lazy Sunday drive! :P
@Braxifen @brianlelas I can’t wait to get stuck into Brotherhood ;)
My French speaking followers, can you please educate me about this picture, posted in our chalet by the child of a previous vacationer. Coat! Coat! What the …? https://t.co/8r4sSs5RuN
Tim Hortoning it back to Montréal. Motes of sugary caffeinated refuge peppered across 500km of Québécois hinterland.

@autumnbreezed I did. Respectfully. Because he didn’t know. How could he? But we need to say it. Everyone needs to espouse the ideology or people will circumvent it. “Hey! [answer] Also, we use Slack. I don’t use Skype much. If you don’t know Slack I can show you but let’s do this.” :)

@autumnbreezed Meetings get a bad rep. Sometimes a good meeting will shortcut weeks of bullshit. If you feel something complex needs discussion together at the same time with people face to face, push for that meeting. :)

@autumnbreezed My favourite is “You’re a DD. Can you book a meeting with X, Y, Z so we can chat about A, B, C?” “No.” “No?” “If I call a meeting, it’s my meeting. I will lead it. There will be an agenda. There will be minutes. This sounds like a meeting YOU want. YOU book it.”
@autumnbreezed I did it to my boss. :)
@autumnbreezed You have my axe.
@autumnbreezed That’s a hard nope.

@autumnbreezed Something similar happened to me recently. I answered the new perosn’s question on Skype and then said “By the way…” And posted a link to our communication policy. You can ignore Slack if you want. People will ignore you, though.
@AlexBurby Oh. Hard pass.
@AlexBurby https://t.co/fHhCPQfxcD
@davshoward So sorry to hear, Davs.
@AlexBurby sluttyNuns++;
Holy shit he wasn’t taking the piss! Sheila is also gutted because not only is it organic but they’ve also managed to exorcise the caffeine out of it. Boo! https://t.co/VJKdOKwUcx
@brianlelas I’ll swallow your soul.
New slant on the “Is Pepsi okay?” meme here in Tadoussac tonight. “Un Coke, s’il vous plaît.” “Is a biologique maple extract concoction okay? It’s not diet, though.” “Eh, sure!”

If you have to take a selfie, make sure it’s your reflection in the window of the murder cabin you’re staying in on your wedding anniversary hundreds of kilometres from civilisation. https://t.co/rwOrV4fHVH
The new Caravaggio is on fire, y’all. https://t.co/umNY6h9JtI
@autumnbreezed @K2theSwift One last night to go. If I’ve learned anything from horror movies set in the woods, this is the night my mind snaps and everyone dies horrifically. Happy Friday! :)
@autumnbreezed @K2theSwift Could be worse. You could be trapped in a murder cabin in Tadoussac. ;) https://t.co/isUuJtzV6e
@GavinDYoung “Look, I’ll level with you: Linda’s dying, she’s turning into broccoli. It’s very contagious, she must be boiled.”
@Omac_brother Congrats!
@SimonJ_McD I’ll inflate the air mattress. I hope you like poutine.
@GameDesignDan Time for bed, Danwuah.
@SimonJ_McD Don’t. You’ll never leave. And then I’ll have to home you. And my place isn’t big enough for us, you, Lauren, and how many cats you’re currently training.
@SimonJ_McD It’s not the shirt. It’s what’s in the shirt they want.
@ultrahax Orsen “Crunch Beard” Welles.
@Geraldineryan74 It’s a lovely cabin. You can’t even see most of the blood stains anymore. ;)
@SimonJ_McD What you need is some Canada time. It’s like America time but you keeping rolling 20s. Canada 🇨🇦 🎲
I had to look up corkscrew in French. Thankfully I found the tire-bouchon at the last minute and didn’t have to appear at the host’s house perpetuating a stereotype.
@ManMadeMoon There was me, that is Vlad, and my three droogs, that is Theresa, Boris, and Dim, and we sat in the Korova Milk-bar …
@GreatDismal Someone else noted that the word “lodestar” is one favoured by Pence; he’s used it in multiple speeches. Seems too on the nose. Unless someone is framing him? This stub is batshit.
@Michael_French A crypto figure. Is that like an elongated eight that might be the infinity symbol but it costs 200 gigawatts of energy to find out which?
@PhillipCostigan It’ll be here in no time :)
@frlinux Have you murdered under the fat blood moon in worse?
@DonH1981 Too late.
This is some Blair Witch shit right here. https://t.co/b8Q5OxCF48
@autumnbreezed @SteveShd Pff. Bling. Who wants bling? #stupidbling
@autumnbreezed It’s you who will kill me, isn’t it?
@SteveShd I have two Fossils and an Apple Watch. And two running watches. Time to make things worse.
Sold and SOLD. https://t.co/HtpRqj9z5d
